Detailed Description

A wxLogPassThrough-derived log target for the WebUpdate classes.

This target processes in smart way the log strings sent by wxLogAdvMsg wxLogUsrMsg wxLogNewSection global functions providing both facilities for saving the log in a wxTextCtrl and into a wxTextFile.
